name: Tic Tac Toe [Remix Edition]
description: You need two players (near proximity to you) and share the phone. Red player goes first and selects a circle. Just like Tic Tac Toe, you need to place the circle on a tile, and the first person to get 3 in a row wins... But there is a catch! Once you open the game, you will notice the circles are in different sizes. That is because you can place larger circles OVER the opponent's smaller circles. Be careful though, you only have 1 of each size....
